text: Alejandro Zaffaroni (February 27, 1923 - March 1, 2014) was a Uruguayan- American entrepreneur. He is best known for founding several successful biotechnology companies in Silicon Valley. He was born in Montevideo. Zaffaroni died from complications of dementia on March 1, 2014 at his home in Atherton, California. He was 91 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Alejandro Zaffaroni interview at the TheTech Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Deaths from dementia Category:People from Montevideo
title: Alejandro Zaffaroni
